name: Shaft Hero Alpha - An Endless Arcade Zig Zag, Don't Fallout - Free
name_original: Shaft Hero Alpha - An Endless Arcade Zig Zag, Don't Fallout - Free
description:
***Most Updated and Improved Game 2015***

Stretch out your Shaft Hero stick to get to the next platform, cross many platforms at once.

• Stretch out Shaft Hero's stick to get to the next platform.
• You can stretch out your stick to cross multiple platforms at once and on Multi Levels.
• Need an extra life? You can now get a continue (minus a few points!)

Annoyingly Addictive - Become an expert a Shaft Hero Expert!
